captures.author: @aakashgupta
captures.text: This paper is quietly one of the most damning findings about current LLM architecture. Google Research tested 7 models across 7 benchmarks. The intervention was embarrassingly simple: paste the prompt twice.
captures.whyInteresting: Google Research: duplicating prompt gives 47/70 wins. Gemini Flash-Lite 21%→97%. Reveals attention architecture gaps.

captures.author: @NickADobos
captures.text: Claude got a huge hidden update. Before: prompt->tool->Claude. After: prompt->Claude writes code+logic->code uses tools iteratively with conditionals->Claude
captures.whyInteresting: Claude now writes code that calls tools with logic/loops instead of one-shot. Major agent capability jump.

captures.author: @arscontexta
captures.whyInteresting: Hot take on agent skill architecture — graphs over flat markdown files

captures.author: @almonk
captures.text: ok hear me out - TikTok but for accepting PR suggestions from background agents running over your codebases
captures.whyInteresting: Creative UX concept — doom-scroll codebase improvements from background agents

captures.author: @himanshustwts
captures.text: anthropic did CONTEXT ENGINEERING on WEB SEARCH
captures.whyInteresting: Insight into how Anthropic engineered Claude Sonnet 4.6 web search via context engineering

captures.author: @aidenybai
captures.text: Introducing React Doctor — Scan your React codebase for anti-patterns. CLI or agent skill. Open source.
captures.whyInteresting: Practical open-source React linter as CLI/agent skill. 7K likes.

captures.author: @kaostyl
captures.text: n8n is dead. I fed my AI all my workflow JSONs and it replaced every single one. 15+ workflows replicated in 20 minutes TOTAL.
captures.whyInteresting: Replaced all n8n workflows with AI-generated self-healing cron jobs in 20 min

captures.author: @pradeep24
captures.text: camofox v1.2 — browser launches on-demand, shuts down after 5min idle, relaunches instantly. 40MB idle mem for agent environments.
captures.whyInteresting: Lightweight on-demand browser for resource-constrained agent setups

captures.author: @jumperz
captures.text: Running 9 agents — context goes stale, tasks get dropped, agents decide on old info. You only notice when output looks wrong.
captures.whyInteresting: Honest multi-agent scaling pain — context staleness, silent failures. Relevant to our setup.

captures.author: @johann_sath
captures.text: Told OpenClaw: you are the orchestrator, never execute. Spins up subagents for everything. Docker, build, deploy. Never sees terminal.
captures.whyInteresting: Pure orchestrator pattern — agent only plans, army of subagents builds

captures.author: @RoundtableSpace
captures.text: New OpenClaw update: Kimi K2.5 free, agents without paid APIs, reusable skills, faster.
captures.whyInteresting: Major OpenClaw update — free model, reusable skills

captures.author: @elonmusk
captures.text: Grok 4.2 release candidate (public beta) is now available.
captures.whyInteresting: New Grok model drop — competitive landscape tracking

captures.author: @Outdoctrination
captures.text: N-Acetylcysteine corrects ADHD in clinical trial. Within 3 doses of 2.4g, improvement seen.
captures.whyInteresting: NAC for ADHD — interesting health/science finding with clinical data

captures.author: @RyanTheGentry
captures.text: OpenClaw Mac Mini setup guide — gotchas, keep-alive scripts, under $20/month.
captures.whyInteresting: Same setup we run — may have useful gotchas and tips

captures.author: @KurtisHanni
captures.text: Connected Claude Sonnet 4.6 to Webflow MCP — found 15-20 SEO issues, auto-fixed them.
captures.whyInteresting: MCP composability in action — Claude + Webflow for auto SEO fixes

captures.author: @garrytan
captures.text: Happenstance: upload LinkedIn export and all people search queries with OpenClaw get way better.
captures.whyInteresting: Simple data enrichment trick — LinkedIn export improves agent people search

captures.author: @hasantoxr
captures.text: 3 ex-Snapchat engineers built AI CMO @layers — reads GitHub, runs entire marketing stack.
captures.whyInteresting: AI marketing agent that reads your GitHub — interesting product

captures.author: @0xSammy
captures.text: Compute-as-metabolism: agent survival tied to wallet balance. x402 implements HTTP 402 Payment Required for agent payments.
captures.whyInteresting: Novel agent architecture concept — earn or die, HTTP 402 for permissionless agent payments
